short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI-powered study assistant that helps explain educational content through screenshots.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
StudyHack+ is an AI-powered study assistant that helps students better understand educational content through intelligent screenshot analysis.

Key Features:
✓ Instant Explanations: Take a screenshot of any educational content for immediate, clear explanations
✓ Works with Major Learning Platforms: Seamlessly integrates with:
  • Canvas
  • Blackboard
  • Moodle
  • Brightspace
  • Google Classroom
  • Google Docs
  • Schoology
  • And more!

How It Works:
1. Click the StudyHack+ icon while on any supported educational platform
2. Select the content you want to understand better
3. Receive clear, detailed explanations instantly

Privacy & Security:
• No personal data collection
• Screenshots are processed securely
• Works only on educational platforms
• Requires minimal permissions
• Clear privacy policy available at studyhack.xyz/privacy-policy

Technical Requirements:
• Works with Chrome version 88 or later
• Internet connection required
• Compatible with all major operating systems

Support:
For assistance, contact our team at support@2029.lol

Note: This extension is designed for educational purposes only and works exclusively with supported learning management systems and educational platforms.
